import { useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { AuthContext } from "../../context/AuthContext"; import "./topbar.css"; export default function TopBar() { const { user, dispatch } = useContext(AuthContext); const PF = "https://api-hl25.onrender.com/images/" const handleLogout = () => { dispatch({ type: "LOGOUT" }); }; return (
  • HOME
  • ABOUT

  • WRITE
  • {user && "LOGOUT"}
{user ? ( ) : (
  • LOGIN

); }
